mapper.select:
select a.`bug_id` as `bugId`, a.`bug_name` as `bugName`, a.`desc` as `desc`, a.`create_time` as `createTime`, a.`create_user_id` as `createUserId`, a.`update_time` as `updateTime`, a.`update_user_id` as `updateUserId`, a.`remark` as `remark`, create_user.`user_name` as `createUserName`, update_user.`user_name` as `updateUserName` from bug a left join user create_user on a.`create_user_id` = create_user.user_id left join user update_user on a.`update_user_id` = update_user.user_id
a.`bug_id` = #{bugId} and
a.`bug_name` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{bugName}), '%')
a.`desc` = #{desc} and
a.`create_time` = #{createTime} and
a.`create_user_id` = #{createUserId} and
a.`update_time` = #{updateTime} and
a.`update_user_id` = #{updateUserId} and
a.`remark` = #{remark} and
